l.desc: Specify a jshintrc file for JSHint linting

D.desc: Time to use as the report date (seconds, > 9999999999 assumed to be ms)

n.desc: Skips empty lines from line count

e.desc: Specify a ESLint configuration file for ESLint linting

b.desc: Specify a Babel configuration file for project parsing

g.desc: Specify a path to the folder containing .git folder

T.desc: Target Node version for the depngn compatibility report. The -p options is required for depngn to run.

p.desc: Root directory of the project to analyze. Needed to run audit/outdated/depngn analysis. Must contain a "lock" file with the project's dependencies.
